page.title: 11MEDIA
page.content: We are lucky today because we have televisons,videos and radios.We have very interesting people on the televison like Terry Wogan. We have telephones,tape recorders and many useful gadgets in the home.These include ovens, dishwashers, washing machines, refrigeraters, freezers and vacuum cleaners. For leisure times we have hifi systems and computers. They have become very popular in the last 2_3 years. Many people are putting them in their homes. Children enjoy playing space invaders, you can play many games.You either have a tape or a disc with the program on. These cost about Â£2.00 _ Â£12.00 If you join a club you get books and games to use. We have computers in school to help us with our work. The latest invention is the video disc.
